attributes.action: Captain Tom Moore should be put forward for a knighthood.
attributes.additional_details: As a 99 year old former WWII soldier to raise vast amounts of money for the NHS during this unprecedented time of Coronavirus is wonderful. He deserves high recognition for his efforts.  It would show how much the country appreciated his effort
attributes.background: Put his name forward for a Knighthood

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
